## find() function

Returns the first element within context that matches the given selector(s).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function find<T extends Element = HTMLElement>(selectors: string, context?: Document | DocumentFragment | Element): null | T;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

selectors


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

One or more selectors to match.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

context


</td><td>

Document \| DocumentFragment \| Element


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The context from which to search from.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

null \| T
